website_summaries.verdict: Since the original Death Star run, this iconic starfighter was a hit with Star Wars enthusiasts, and LEGO’s Y-Wing sports built-in battle features to keep kids playing for longer.
pros: Impressive recreation of the classic Y-Wing spaceship
Includes Moroff, Admiral Raddus, and other figures
cons: This yellow space ship is fairly pricy

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Package says 8-14 but my friend is 28 and loved it so you're lucky I don't dock a star for being misleading. Unless, maybe that's how long it's supposed to take to finish? Which would also be absurd. 8-14 years? My friend completed this model in 3. Five stars until we test this model on our homemade death star.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Best lego star wars has to offer
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, extremely intricately detailed, sturdy construction, perfect for kids or collectors
customer_reviews.author: BKNY

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this set was that someone had opened it previously, taken a package of the legos out and taped it back up. My son has sent Lego an email telling them the set number and which package was missing and they will send him a new package. They are pretty good about doing that so I'm not too upset about it. But my son...well when he gets in Lego mode he gets real upset when pieces are missing, but he is waiting for the replacement package, impatiently. That is why I only gave it 3-stars, because of the missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: docee

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Y-Wing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Y-Wing, and have been wanting one for years now. This was the first chance I had to get it, and I really liked putting it together. There are so many cool and nifty tricks to get those angles and curves on the cockpit, and I like the way that the engines are built. I don't really have any complaints on this, except that the Y-Wing pilot is exactly the same as the pilot that comes in the U-Wing. Which is kind of sad, since I'm trying to amass a whole fleet of Rebel pilots. And the fact that I dropped an engine during construction and completely lost a piece. But ah well, that's on me.
customer_reviews.author: S. RyDerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Finished product way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm an "original trilogy" hardliner, but hear me out on this one. Why did the plain gray landscape of the plain gray X-wing run through the plain gray death star canyon to deliver photon torpedoes thrill us so? I don't know the answer to this. But I know the new X-wing lego (75102, Poe's) is orange and black, yuck. The Y-Wing Starfighter has the light gray color scheme that makes Star Wars what it is (was): the gray ships fighting on a background of stars. I was hesitant to let my son get this one, because how can a y wing be better than an x wing? But once he built it, I had a change of heart.
customer_reviews.author: Jo dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Star Wars Product
customer_reviews.text: It's no surprise that the Y-Wing Lego Star Wars was very enjoyable to build with my son. It has over 600 pieces and plenty of details. The additional Lego figures was nice to have since my son loves to collect them.
customer_reviews.author: santanarg

customer_reviews.title: Y-Wing Fighter Rules the Galaxy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible set. Note that in addition to the Y-Wing, the set includes a munitions loader and 5 minifigs, including a surprise Stormtrooper. The set is a little more complicated than your average LEGO Star Wars set to assemble, but the payoff is a lot of detail and cool features like the bombing ability. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon V.

customer_reviews.title: This is not the new ultimate edition Y-Wing
customer_reviews.text: Not the latest version of this kit. It's a great Y wing kit, however this is the 691 piece version; not the 1967 piece ultimate collector version. So you're getting exactly what is describe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to get a nice Y-Wing set for a while. The UCS set is a bit too expensive. This is absolutely amazing. As they are more for collecting for me, I can't comment on the playability. However, it is a fun build and looks beautiful with other sets!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Celli

customer_reviews.title: Love star wars, love this lego set.
customer_reviews.text: Legos are legos, virtually indestructible if you don't lose them in the toilet or to the vacuum gods. The price at the time of purchase was competitive with retail with better availability. I would purchase again if I had gobs of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with box
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid I had a original one of these, not Lego, but made by another company. This brought me back. Pleased with box , it came in pristine and all bags, pieces, and manuals where there. Thinking of picking my kid up one for his B-Day!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan MacInnes

customer_reviews.title: Took my expert 9 yo 3 hours to build it.
customer_reviews.text: It came wrapped in a Christmas package. Very cute. BUT what if the child is picking up the mail? Well that happened to me during Thanksgiving break. I would appreciate if they also put it inside a box. The toy is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Blore

customer_reviews.title: Cool design and great to build
customer_reviews.text: So good. I have the Poe Dameron X-Wing and love the color scheme and intricacies of building it but I think the Y-Wing is even better. Really cool design and as with most of the lego stuff so much behind the scenes that you don't see but are great little details you get to work on
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Bose UVM

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and played with it daily until he lost one of the pieces. He "upgraded" with some of his other thousands of legos and still likes it, almost as much.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Y-Wing
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely built and great looking Y-Wing that fits perfectly with my 75175 A-Wing and my 75218 X-Wing on display.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great Model, but Delicate?
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars, but this is one of those "delicate" LEGO builds. Very "ephemeral" connections between major body components, but a great addition to your Star Wars LEGO collection!
customer_reviews.author: Little Buddha

customer_reviews.title: The best of the modern Lego SW ships
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Lego set. Fun build with great detail. This seems to be the best of the modern Lego SW ships outside of the ultimate collector series and similar multi hundreds of dollars sets. Great attention to detail in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice update to the previous Lego Y-Wing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice update to the previous Lego Y-Wing. A few stickers but most all Lego models in this price range have stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut Poptart

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the sets that make up the Star Wars plasti-verse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for like 20$ a long time ago. Great purchase. Uses stickers though, we all hate stickers on plastic blocks since they tend to peel over time.
customer_reviews.author: MiG

customer_reviews.title: I love the Y-wing
customer_reviews.text: And this is a great kit. Pretty large too! Kinda puts my B-wing kit out of scale. Had a great time building this while watching movies.

customer_reviews.title: Admiral Raddus!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set with a very cool bomb bay mechanism for playability. Admiral Raddus minifig is brilliant! Price is a little high but certainly not too bad. Would definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: The Y-Wing is the work horse of the rebel fleet.
customer_reviews.text: The Y-Wing is the work horse of the rebel fleet. It’s not quick or flashy but it gets the job done. The armor on this ship is extensive, and the shields will protect you from just about anything, which is good, because you won’t be going anywhere fast. The Y-Wing is used mainly as a bomber because it can carry a heavy payload of missiles, torpedoes and bombs. The other important weapon is the topside ION canon, which rather than destroying a target, can disable it for later capture. Our canons have a computer assisted auto-fire feature, so don’t forget that when your in the heat of battle.
customer_reviews.author: Salute Your Shorts

customer_reviews.title: It Is A Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson was overly "joyful" at Christmas when he opened this present. He is a Star Wars fanatic and thought this set was really big. He loved the characters that came with it . It does have a lot of pieces but it is well worth the price which is "Priceless" when you see a smile that big!

customer_reviews.title: A Good Kit With Some Fun Build Techniques
customer_reviews.text: This was a good kit and took slightly longer to build than others in this piece count due to the amount of small bricks. It uses a couple interesting build techniques, and aside from the two engines, is not repetitive. I mark it down a star because the number of 1x1 bricks gets tedious and the final ship looks a little off to me (not quite aesthetically correct).

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Y-Wing Starfighter 75172 Star Wars Toy (691 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Expand your Rebel fleet with this iconic Y-Wing Starfighter LEGO Star Wars toy. The unmistakable workhorse of the Rebel Alliance has been faithfully reproduced with LEGO bricks and features many play starters, including retractable landing gear, an opening mini figure cockpit, rotating guns, dual spring-loaded shooters, and gearwheel-operated bomb-drop function. This great model also comes with a weapons loader with turning crane and extra ammo for even more immersive play. Includes four mini figures and a droid figure.
feature_bullets: Build the iconic Y-Wing Starfighter, featuring rotating guns and weapons loader with turning crane and extra ammo
Featured in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
Includes Y-Wing Pilot, Admiral Raddus, Moroff and a Stormtrooper, plus Rebel Astromech Droid
LEGO Star Wars building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Y-Wing Starfighter measures over 2" high, 16" long and 7" wide. Weapons loader measures over 3" high, 6" long and 2" wide
691 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars541 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
